Title: Relates to the amount of the indemnity bond or insurance required by common carrier ambulettes, paratransit vehicles, and commuter vans
Summary: Relates to the minimum required amount of the indemnity bond or insurance policy required by certain common carrier ambulettes, paratransit vehicles, and commuter vans.
LawCode: Amd ยง370, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to indemnity bonds or insurance policies for common carrier ambulettes, paratransit vehicles, and commuter vans
